## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have checked for and fixed any TypeScript errors

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have added property-based tests where applicable
- [ ] Test coverage has not decreased

### Documentation

- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README.md if needed
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments to new functions/classes
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md

### Security

- [ ] I have not introduced any security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not hardcoded any secrets or sensitive information
- [ ] I have validated all user inputs
- [ ] I have followed security best practices

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have not added unnecessary dependencies
- [ ] All new dependencies are from trusted sources
- [ ] I have checked for security vulnerabilities in new dependencies
